alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:41PM CDT until April 17 at 11:17AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River At Sunflower. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Field west of river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 18.8 Thu 7 pm CDT 21.7 20.8 14.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 845 AM CDT.
